ResultHandler that writes the transformed record to a BLOB.

Syntax
Copy

Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
blobColumn	number	1
Column that contains the BLOB to be updated
blobsCompressed	boolean	true
Controls whether blobdata is stored compressed in the database
blobCharset	text	-
Charset that is used to read and write BLOBs. This assumes the blob contains character data. If
